```{r include=FALSE}
library( DCF )
```

Looking for the popularity of names in the bible.

Names found [here](http://cyberspacei.com/jesusi/doc/bibles/names/biblenames2.html#J).

```{r}
BibleNames <- read.csv("bibleNames.csv",as.is=TRUE)
```

```{r}
InTheBible <-
  BabyNames %>% 
  inner_join( BibleNames %>% select(name) )
```

Total names by year
```{r}
InTheBible %>%
  group_by( year, sex ) %>%
  summarise( total=sum(count)) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x=year, y=total)) +
  geom_line( aes( group=sex, color=sex ) )
```

Most popular names

```{r}
ByCount <-
  InTheBible %>%
  group_by( name, sex ) %>%
  summarise( total=sum(count) ) %>% 
  spread(key=sex,value=total) %>%
  arrange( desc(M+F) )
```

By name balance
```{r}
SexBalance <-
  ByCount %>%
  mutate( balance=pmin(M/F, F/M)) %>%
  arrange( desc( balance ) )
```
